attributes.action: change maternity and paternity laws so that both parents are treated equally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Women are at present entitled to 39 weeks statutory maternity pay, or maternity allowance.

Men are entitled to 2 weeks.

If this government, as it repeatedly bleats, is in favour of equality, then why does it champion so many unequal laws?
